content: Investments ETF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 Jun 2019Any of you purchase any of the S&P 500 ETF? I’m looking at VANGUARD FUNDS PLC VANGUARD S&P 500 UCITS ETF cos it is listed on London Stock Exchange and therefore the withholding tax will be 15% instead of 30%, correct me if i’m wrong. Or do you guys have any good other etf to recommened?1 answerAnswerBump1
